remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 除了處理編譯的組件 ( 和 方法) 之外，這個 實作會處理尚未編譯的型別 ()。This implementation, in addition to handling compiled assemblies ( and methods), can handle types that have not been compiled yet (). 使用 傳回所參考之型別的 有限實作。The limited implementation of is returned for types referenced using . > [!NOTE] > 只會從參考的組件傳回公用型別，而從本機組件傳回公用和非公用型別。 only returns public types from referenced assemblies, and both public and non-public types from local assemblies.
